text:
@ImranKhanPTI You are just so funny. Should be on Saturday Night Live (SNL) as a comedic act.

India's COVID-19 relief fund is more then your country's GDP so offering money that your people are in dire need of just shows your gimmickry to score points with your own countrymen.
